definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Adelaide, capital of South Australia/also written 阿德萊德|阿德莱德
Fredericton, capital of New Brunswick, Canada
pinyin: Fu2 lei2 de2 li3 ke4 dun4

sentences.english: Our thinking is of the Fred Flintstone vintage, hence the Chinese blow us away.
sentences.chinese: 我们的思维是弗雷德是延续，因此中国任意打击我们。

sentences.english: We're having a whip-round for old Fred , who's leaving the firm.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在为即将从公司退休的老弗雷德进行募捐。

sentences.english: If Fred didn't leave till five o'clock, he can't be home yet.
sentences.chinese: 如果弗雷德五点钟以后走护短，现在还不可能到家。

sentences.english: Pvt. James Frederick, Ryan Well, does that - does that mean my brothers are OK.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德里克那意味着他们还好吧？

sentences.english: Charmed to see you, Mr. Redond.
sentences.chinese: 雷德蒙先生，见到您很荣幸。

sentences.english: Hi. I'm Fred O'Hare the first human Easter Bunny.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，大家好，我是弗雷德o奥黑尔第一个成为。

sentences.english: Treadway had taking first place in six out of the nine events she attended.
sentences.chinese: 特雷德韦曾考虑首先在六出九个事件，她出席了会议。

sentences.english: Fred is a nark. He squealed.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德是警方的眼线，是他告的密。

sentences.english: He is called Alfred, or Alf for short.
sentences.chinese: 人们称他艾尔弗雷德，或者简称为阿尔夫。

sentences.english: his face got red. Mr. Carr kept looking at Alfred coldly.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔先生冷冷地直盯着艾尔弗雷德。

sentences.english: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac were bailed out by the government.
sentences.chinese: 范尼梅和雷德马克已经得到政府的救助了。

sentences.english: Braid followed in the footsteps of Old Tom Morris to become a legend in course design.
sentences.chinese: 布雷德在球场设计上是继老汤姆莫尔斯的一个传奇。

sentences.english: Erich Raeder's religion has always been the German Navy.
sentences.chinese: 德国海军简直就是埃里希雷德尔的宗教。

sentences.english: Why is the War of Resistance Against Japan a protracted war?
sentences.chinese: 亚瑟对抗莫德雷德的战争持续了很久。

sentences.english: The Brute looked about the bridge, blinked, and then glared at Fred.
sentences.chinese: 鬼面兽看着舰桥，眨着眼睛，然后怒视着弗雷德。

sentences.english: The policewoman was a heroine in Freds eyes.
sentences.chinese: 女警察成了弗雷德眼里的女英雄。

definition: Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
